line: you said there would be other guys here
there are no other guys here
chandler there’s a guy right over there
this doesn’t make you less of a guy
i hate to think what this woman was scratching when this broke off
hey you know who used to have nails like that
joey let me ask you a question
what does this light switch do
didn’t it drive you crazy to have a switch and not know what it did
they wouldn’t have put it there if it didn’t do something
well here’s another question for ya
uhh do you know what that silver knob on the toilet does
now that since you know when you come over would you mind actually using it
guess who we ran into today
yeah i’m riding the alimony pony
i just came up to say hi
and you sweetie i’ll see you tonight
i thought you were crazy about her
yeah i know but all of those little annoying things she did before we fell in love
like her voice her laugh her personality well they’re all back
and she’s picked up like nine new ones
so what are you doing bringing her here
i’m taking care of it tonight
you have never been able to break up with her
well i don’t have to break up with her this time
i’m going to do a pre emptive strike
i’m going to end it with her before it starts
yeah try sticking it in the freezer for 20 minutes
i can’t believe you really walk alone here
i mean you hear such stories about new york
no it’s really not that bad
i mean i i for one feel perfectly safe
ross these are friends of mine from home
oh hey that was a good one huh
i’ve been meaning to ring you ever since i arrived but umm well i’ve been rather busy
do you realise that we have not seen each other since the night of that u2 concert
well actually the last time you and i saw each other was that morning
so uh what were you guys playing soccer or something or should i call it football
in fact we’re playing a game at the park tomorrow
you’re welcome to play too if you want
what’s ah what’s so funny about that
well i mean you’re american to start with
you don’t even have rugby here
well we didn’t have freedom here until 1776 either so
we’ll see you at riverside park at 2 00
oh boy i just love to sing
yes i i know that you do but i think one of the reasons people were complaining though was that they paid to hear the actor sing old man river
who would’ve thought that cupid had a station at 14th street nails
i’m just getting out of a very serious relationship
and i’m just getting out of a marriage i mean talk about meant to be
i just think that this is happening too soon
face it honey i am not letting you get away this time
unfortunately my company is transferring me overseas
okay could you just stop talking for a second
that’s right yes i’m being transferred to yemen
ugh well i will just have to soak up every once of chandler bing until that moment comes
but i do know that it’s some time tomorrow
this switch thing has been driving me crazy
so i turned it off and checked every outlet
now four of them don’t work
which means one of them has to be controlled by the switch
so i plugged in things in all four of the outlets that that make noise so that way when i turn it on i just follow the noise and find out which one it is
i bet i stopped listening before you did
y’know you you also could’ve used uh lamps and then followed the light
oh my god that’s so freaky
ooh hey could we put on the news
i think it might be raining
oh just hold on a second
i’m watching this rugby thing on espn
i don’t know what the big deal is
i’m man enough to play this sport
dude you’re not even man enough to order the channel that carries the sport
y’know uh you didn’t really have to help me pack
ohh well when you said all you were going to be doing between now and the time you leave is packing you didn’t really leave me much choice
well i i thought i did but i i guess i did not
y’know i’m i’m packing ‘cause i’m moving to yemen tomorrow
i’m only going to pretend i’m moving to yemen it’s the only way i can get rid off her
and yemen that actually sounds like a real country
come on i’m gonna show how to roll up your underwear and stuff it in your shoes
yeah i know i do that ‘cause it makes me look taller
ross i can’t believe you said you’d play rugby
i mean look how brutal this is
please ross you you got hurt playing badminton with my dad
that’s ‘cause ‘cause you’re mom’s dog kept kept looking at me
okay ross look look look look look right here
and is a hum kinda like a scruddle
well why are you doing this anyway
well you should’ve seen the guy that she used to go out with
i mean he’s like joe rugby
i see how you did that
anyway she thought the very idea of me playing rugby with him was like hilarious
so i’m gonna show her how tough i really am
you’re right you are a tough guy
you’re the toughest palaeontologist i know
all right come on look ross can take care of himself
i’ll just stay real energetic and stay away from the ball
i’ll uh i’ll be that guy right out of the circle
oh well maybe there was a dog lookin’ at him
stay away from that guy and that guy
they don’t look any bigger than me
well maybe that’s because you’re closer to you
so you look bigger to you from where you are
i’m just going to say hi to the lads
okay i know what i have to do
i’ve got to go red ross
i totally don’t know what you’re talking about
the time we were all waiting in line for dances with wolves and that one guy cut in line in front of us and i just lost it
tell the lads to go easy on ross it’s his first time
you are not going to believe it
joshua came into work today and guess what happened
but i was showing him some cufflinks and i felt his pulse
okay okay okay should i be scared
i know that switch does something okay
so so i went down to city hall and got these
all i had to do was pay 25 and wait in line for three hours
y’know you really didn’t have to take me to the airport
besides somebody had to ride in that other taxi with the rest of your luggage and your friends don’t really seem to care too much that you’re leaving
well we’re really not that close
okay so i guess this is uh good bye then
it’s not good bye i’m not leaving until you get on that plane
then i guess it’s just wait here then
i need one fake ticket to yemen
no no no i just i just need a pretend ticket
i’m sorry sir i don’t understand
what would you give to a kid if he wanted a ticket to play with
are you travelling with a child
all right y’know what she’s gonna think that i’m handing you a credit card but what i’m really gonna do is hand you a library card
ah sir a ticket to yemen is 2 100 and we don’t take library cards
i can’t believe they’re doing that to him
i told them to go easy on him
no offence but y’know sometimes it’s hard to understand you y’know with the accent so
that’s just halftime there’s more of this
hey could you do me a favour
could you just grab me a bottle of water
tell my son that i love him
well okay i gotta have some more fun
ross they are killing you out there
dude if you go back out there you’re gonna be dead ross
i insist on finishing this game
all right all right if you insist on doing this at least let me help you
that is no place for a woman
i just may know a few things that might help you inflict some pain
listen closely devon has got a weak ankle
one swift kick and he’ll back off
all right bad ankle got it
and that big bloke with the beard he has got a trick hip
and uh and david over there i heard he doesn’t wear a cup
i can use that trick hip no cup okay
and uh liam liam’s got bad knees
you hit him right and he’ll go down like a lamp
but but liam’s on my team
okay i am going back in
what what are what are these
oh just some pictures i made and hung up
i thought they’d brighten up the place
i know that there’s no hole there i just really liked that picture
okay but there is a wire back there
i mean that switch is connected to something
the wires have come loose in your head
i just thought that if i could follow the wire i could find out what it did
it disappears back there behind that baseboard
for a minute there i thought it went downstairs
now are you sure you don’t want to go see a doctor
that that’ll just bring me down
i mean i i i was great
if someone would just grab my wallet it’s in my pocket
uhh look your eye’s still popping out a little i’m gonna go get some ice
i am so in the mood for ice
oh i kinda was wasn’t i
i made a man twice my size cry
i mean i haven’t done that since i was four and i washed my dad’s porsche with rocks
you really enjoyed yourself didn’t you
i i hurt three huge men i gave a guy a bloody nose i mean i i’m not proud of it but i really am
and it’s all because of you wonderful amazing you
this is the final boarding call for flight 664 to yemen
well i i guess i gotta go
do you even know how long you’re going to be gone
well just until we find an energy source to replace fuel
i had to have one last kiss and also also you said that you were going to leave right after i got on the plane
i wanna see you take off
well i then guess i’m going to yemen
when we get to yemen can i stay with you
the super couldn’t figure out what it did
a 200 an hour electrician couldn’t figure out what it did
i’ve had seven pretty serious shocks
i guess joey was right it does nothing
